q: According to the CNV safety message, why did some serious safety incidents occur during routine operations?
opts: Weak risk awareness due to familiarity and assumptions

q: What is the primary purpose of standards in maintaining safety?
opts: To set clear direction and common expectations

q: What should supervisors and operators do when conditions change during operations?
opts: Pause and reassess when circumstances change

q: How do leaders reinforce safety according to the CNV message?
opts: By enforcing rules only during audits
By prioritising mission completion over safety
By role modelling safe behaviours and setting boundaries

q: Why are daily habits critical to sustaining safety?
opts: They reduce the need for standards
They ensure safety only during emergencies
They shape instincts and keep safe behaviour consistent
